body_html:
👍 for changing the prepositions to 'on' :-)

All the fields are date time fields. While I am not a native speaker, I believe »at« is more appropriate for a concrete time. I don't have strong feelings about it, though. Let's merge this and maybe change the preposition later.
body_text:
👍 for changing the prepositions to 'on' :-)

All the fields are date time fields. While I am not a native speaker, I believe »at« is more appropriate for a concrete time. I don't have strong feelings about it, though. Let's merge this and maybe change the preposition later.
body:
> 👍 for changing the prepositions to 'on' :-)

All the fields are date *time* fields. While I am not a native speaker, I believe »at« is more appropriate for a concrete time. I don't have strong feelings about it, though. Let's merge this and maybe change the preposition later. :shipit:
